readings.title: My future
readings.scene: 这段对话发生在教室内，老师询问学生们关于未来的职业理想。

keySentencePatterns.pattern: What do you want to be?

dialogues.speaker: Teacher
dialogues.content: What do you want to be, children?
dialogues.contentCn: 老师：孩子们，你们将来想做什么？

dialogues.speaker: Joe
dialogues.content: I want to be a pilot. I want to fly a plane in the sky.
dialogues.contentCn: 乔：我想成为一名飞行员。我想在天空中驾驶飞机。

dialogues.speaker: Kitty
dialogues.content: I want to be a doctor. I want to help people.
dialogues.contentCn: 吉蒂：我想成为一名医生。我想帮助人们。

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.content: I want to be a teacher. I want to teach English in a school.
dialogues.contentCn: 艾丽丝：我想成为一名老师。我想在学校里教英语。

dialogues.speaker: Peter
dialogues.content: I want to be a cook. I want to cook nice food.
dialogues.contentCn: 彼得：我想成为一名厨师。我想烹饪美味的食物。

readings.title: Froggy's new job
readings.scene: 这段文本描述了小青蛙寻找适合自己职业的过程。

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.content: Froggy wants to be a pilot. He wants to fly a plane, but he is afraid of flying.
dialogues.contentCn: 旁白：小青蛙想成为一名飞行员。他想开飞机，但他害怕飞行。

dialogues.speaker: Froggy
dialogues.contentCn: 小青蛙：救命！救命！这儿太高了！

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.content: Froggy wants to be a singer, but he is not good at singing.
dialogues.contentCn: 旁白：小青蛙想成为一名歌手，但他并不擅长唱歌。

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.content: One day, a chick falls into the lake! A lifeguard jumps into the lake. Froggy jumps into the lake too. They save the chick.
dialogues.contentCn: 旁白：一天，一只小鸡掉进了湖里！一名救生员跳进了湖中。小青蛙也跳进了湖里。他们救了小鸡。

dialogues.speaker: Lifeguard
dialogues.content: You're good at swimming. Do you want to be a lifeguard?
dialogues.contentCn: 救生员：你很擅长游泳。你想成为一名救生员吗？

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.content: Froggy becomes a lifeguard. He likes his new job.
dialogues.contentCn: 旁白：小青蛙成为了一名救生员。他喜欢他的新工作。
